session-lifespan-in-minutes.label: Session lifespan
session-lifespan-in-minutes.helper_text: The maximum time a customer can be logged in without activity.
session-lifespan-in-minutes.v8n_too_long: We limit session lifespan to 4 weeks for security reasons. Please select a smaller value.

allowed-origins.label: Allowed origins
allowed-origins.helper_text: The list of origins that are allowed to access the Customer Portal API. Must be https unless it's localhost. You can add up to 10 origins in this section.
allowed-origins.placeholder: Enter an origin and press Enter
allowed-origins.v8n_invalid: Some of the origins you've entered are invalid. Please check the items marked with ⚠️ and correct them.
allowed-origins.v8n_too_many: We support up to 10 origins. Please remove some of them.

jwt-shared-secret.label: JWT shared secret
jwt-shared-secret.helper_text: We use this key to sign customer JWTs. Changing it will drop all active sessions.
jwt-shared-secret.v8n_invalid: Only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) and dashes (-) are allowed in this field.
jwt-shared-secret.v8n_too_short: This value must be at least 40 characters long.

features.label: Features
features.option_next_date_modification: Next payment date changes for subscriptions

sign-up-verification-hcaptcha-site-key.label: hCaptcha site key
sign-up-verification-hcaptcha-site-key.helper_text: By default, we use our own hCaptcha site key for all portal installs. If you have a hCaptcha account and would like to use your own key, enter it here.

sign-up-verification-hcaptcha-secret-key.label: hCaptcha secret key
sign-up-verification-hcaptcha-secret-key.helper_text: By default, we use our own hCaptcha secret key for all portal installs. If you have a hCaptcha account and would like to use your own key, enter it here.

subscriptions-allow-frequency-modificati.label: Frequency options
subscriptions-allow-frequency-modificati.helper_text: Customize how your customers can change the payment schedule of their subscriptions. You can add up to 10 rules in this section.
subscriptions-allow-frequency-modificati.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this rule.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

jsonata-query.label: JSONata query
jsonata-query.helper_text: This rule will apply only to subscriptions that match this query. We will run this query against the standard fx:subscription object.
jsonata-query.v8n_required: Please enter a JSONata expression. You can use * to match all subscriptions.
jsonata-query.v8n_too_long: Please limit your query to 200 characters.

values.label: Values
values.helper_text: The frequency options that will be available to the customer. You can add up to 20 options.
values.v8n_required: Please enter at least one value.
values.v8n_too_long: Only up to 20 values are allowed. Please remove some of them to proceed.

delete.delete_prompt: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this rule.

subscriptions-allow-next-date-modificati.label: Next payment date options
subscriptions-allow-next-date-modificati.helper_text: Customize how your customers can change the next payment date of their subscriptions. You can add up to 10 rules in this section.
subscriptions-allow-next-date-modificati.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this rule.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

jsonata-query.label: JSONata query
jsonata-query.helper_text: This rule will apply only to subscriptions that match this query. We will run this query against the standard fx:subscription object.
jsonata-query.v8n_required: Please enter a JSONata expression. You can use * to match all subscriptions.
jsonata-query.v8n_too_long: Please limit your query to 200 characters.

minmax-restrictions.label: Range restrictions
minmax-restrictions.helper_text: Prevent customers from setting the next payment date too close to the current date or too far in the future. You will be able to customize the exact values below.

min.label: Minimum
min.helper_text: Select the period during which the next payment date can't be set.

max.label: Maximum
max.helper_text: Select the period after which the next payment date can't be set.

day-and-date-restrictions.label: Day and date restrictions
day-and-date-restrictions.helper_text: Opt to restrict the next payment date to a specific day of the week or date of the month. You will be able to customize the exact values below.

days-of-week.label: Allowed days of week
days-of-week.helper_text: Select all days of week that the next payment date can be set to.

dates-of-month.label: Allowed dates of month
dates-of-month.placeholder: Enter a date (e.g. 14) and press Enter
dates-of-month.helper_text: Add all dates of month that the next payment date can be set to.

disallowed-dates.label: Disallowed dates
disallowed-dates.helper_text: Prevent customers from setting the next payment date to specific dates or date ranges. You can add up to 10 items in this section.
disallowed-dates.v8n_too_long: Only up to 10 values are allowed. Please remove some of them to proceed.

delete.delete_prompt: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this rule.
Disabling Customer Portal will erase the configuration and disable the related APIs. Would you like to proceed?
